meanings.definition: A Japanese sliding door or room divider made of translucent paper over a wooden frame.
meanings.sent1: The shoji in the house allowed soft light to filter through.
meanings.sent2: She peeked through the shoji to see the garden outside.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the shoji but got tangled in the paper.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a shoji, revealing only fragments of his thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The shoji whispered secrets as the wind gently rustled its paper panels.

meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat pawed at the shoji, trying to catch a glimpse outside.

meanings.definition: A style of Japanese architecture featuring sliding doors and screens.

meanings.sent2: He admired the simplicity of shoji architecture during his visit to Japan.
